Map078.Event[108].Page[0].list.message[1: As if something was rising from the pool of blood...
Map078.Event[108].Page[0].list.message[2: The wheels of torment, along with the tormented one sank
into the pool of blood as quietly as they rose from it.
Map078.Event[108].Page[0].list.message[3: You feel as if a millenia of torment just slipped before
your eyes. You almost feel sorry for this tormented deity.
Map078.Event[108].Page[0].list.message[4: But any feeling of pity is greatly overshadowed by your
Map078.Event[108].Page[0].list.message[5: Not just a personal accomplishment, but as if something
greater has just started to change...
